publishedfiledetails.title: Builder's Improvements (vanilla improved)
publishedfiledetails.description:
[h1]Builder's Improvements[/h1]
[b]ModID=854186603[/b]
[h1]This mod does NOT implement new structures. 
The mod adds snap points and changes some restrictions of vanilla structures. 
Just subscribe the mod, install it and it will work out of the box.
[/h1]

0.9A
feeding trough: snap points
trophy base: snap points
catwalks snap on ramps to build stairs
crop plots and fence foundations are easier to place unsnapped because of a smaller snap range, but they still snap 
minor bugfixes

GameUserSettings.ini:
[code][BuildersImprovements]
NumberOfStructures=2               default: 2 (up to 16)
PreventFreeFloors=1      default: remove the entry
[/code]

[olist][*]This mod adds additional "snap points" to the following structures:[list]
[*][b]Cliff Platform[/b]snap points for fence foundations and walls
[*][b]Tree Platform[/b]snap points for fence foundations
[*][b]Sloped Roofs[/b]snap points on top of walls and sloped roofs
[*][b]Foundations[/b]stack floors on top of each other
[*][b]Ceilings[/b] support for pillars and crop plots. snaps also on level of foundations
[*][b]Ramps[/b] railings can be snapped to ramps and sloped roofs
[*][b]Pillars[/b] pillars now have an additional snap point for other pillars
[*][b]Crop Plots[/b] crop plots can be snapped on foundations and ceilings
[*][b]Refrigators[/b] snap together
[*][b]Preserving Bins[/b] snap together
[*][b]Feeding Troughs[/b] snap together
[*][b]Storage Boxes (small, normal, large)[/b] snap together
[*][b]Book Storage[/b] snap together
[*][b]Railings[/b] snap to ramps and catwalks
[*][b]Cat walks[/b] snap to ramps to build stairs
[*][b]Straight Electric cables[/b] has more snap points, more angels to snap
[*][b]Straight Pipes[/b] has more snap points, more angels to snap
[*][b]Trophy bases[/b] snap together

[/list]
[*]This mod disables collision
[*]This mod extends nearby foundation requirements for walls and ceilings to 16 structures instead two.
[*]This mod disables foundations snapping to ground, so you can snap foundations together, which do not have ground contact except for the first.
[*][b]Removing THIS mod does not affect the VANILLA structures, which are placed with this mod active.[/b][/olist]
